code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import CoatArms from'../assets/CoatArms.png';import'./MeetTheBrothers.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MeetTheBrothers=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUsers=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5001/api/meet_the_brothers',{});console.log('Fetched users:',response.data);setUsers(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching users:',error);}};fetchUsers();},[]);const groupedUsers=users.reduce((groups,user)=>{const classGroup=user.class||'Unknown Class';if(!groups[classGroup]){groups[classGroup]=[];}groups[classGroup].push(user);return groups;},{});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"meet-the-brothers",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Meet the Brothers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:CoatArms,alt:"CoatArms",className:"CoatArms"}),Object.keys(groupedUsers).map(classGroup=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"class-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[classGroup," Class"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-grid",children:groupedUsers[classGroup].map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"brother-card",children:[user.profilePic&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://localhost:5001/${user.profilePic}`,alt:`${user.firstName} ${user.lastName}`,className:"profile-pic",onError:e=>console.error(`Failed to load image: http://localhost:5001/${user.profilePic}`)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"user-name",children:[user.firstName," ",user.lastName]}),user.role&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"user-role",children:user.role}),user.major&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"user-major",children:user.major})]},user.email))})]},classGroup))]});};export default MeetTheBrothers;
